project_title: EEG for cognitve load analysis
description: EEG offers a direct, real-time window into brain activity, making it a powerful tool for measuring cognitive load by detecting changes in brainwave patterns associated with mental effort. This capability allows for the optimization of learning materials, work environments, and user interfaces by tailoring them to human cognitive capacities.

project_title: Integrating Waste Quarry Dust Sludge and Agro Wastes in Fireless Brick Manufacturing
description: To explore the feasibility of utilizing waste quarry dust sludge and agro wastes in fireless brick production, aiming to enhance brick strength, durability, and environmental sustainability. Investigate the properties of waste materials, conduct laboratory tests on brick samples, and assess the economic and environmental feasibility of the proposed approach. Expected Outcome: Development of a sustainable and cost-effective method for fireless brick manufacturing.

project_title: Groundwater Quality Management
description: Ground water is a major source of water resources for drinking and irrigation purposes. Rapid urbanization and expansion of agricultural land leads to groundwater exploitation which deteriorates the groundwater quality. This study focuses on analyzing the groundwater quality in near by regions of their interest.

project_title: Specially designed alarm clock for people with hearing loss
description: To design a vibrator-based alarm clock for using 555 timer and other electronic components useful for people with hearing loss.

project_title: Micro controller based Speed control of BLDC motor.
description: A low cost STM 32 arm processor is used to control the speed of BLDC motor used in quad copter flying robotic application.

project_title: Nanoclay formulation for heat rash skin condition
description: In situ synthesis of zinc and ferric oxide on the surface of nanoclay will be used to formulate a powder/lotion for treating heat rash skin condition.

project_title: Smart Plant Monitoring System: Promoting Sustainable Agriculture
description: This project involves creating a system that monitors and manages the health of plants using IoT sensors. Students can design and implement sensors to measure soil moisture, temperature, and light levels, helping farmers optimize water usage and improve crop yield. This aligns with Sustainable Development Goal 2, which aims to end hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture.

project_title: Automatic street light controller using LDR and Transistors
description: This project aims to control street lights with the use of light dependent resistors and transistors. The students will understand the basic functionality of LDR and transistors and will have exposure to PCB layout design and enclosure designs.

project_title: New foundation for AI
description: It describes new method for AI to mimic human intelligence

project_title: Decarbonization of Buildings
description: Energy efficient buildings and use of solar thermal systems leading to reduction in GHG emissions will be highlighted

project_title: Rope climbing robot
description: Design and develop a rope climbing robot for vertical traverse

project_title: Green Synthesis of Nanoparticles and its Application in Wastewater Treatment
description: Green synthesis of nanoparticles refers to the environmentally friendly production of nanoparticles using natural sources. This approach offers several advantages including reduced toxicity, lower energy consumption, and sustainability. When applied to wastewater treatment, nanoparticles synthesized through green methods can effectively remove pollutants and contaminants from water. These nanoparticles, due to their small size and high surface area, exhibit enhanced catalytic and adsorption properties, making them efficient in the degradation of organic pollutants, heavy metal ions, and other harmful substances present in wastewater.

project_title: nTed Talks Recommendation System with Machine Learning
description: When did we see a video on youtube let's say it was funny then the next time you open your youtube app you get recommendations of some funny videos in your feed ever thought about how? This is nothing but an application of Machine Learning using which recommender systems are built to provide personalized experience and increase customer engagement.

project_title: Enhancing Smart Drip Irrigation system with IoT integration and Edge Computing
description: This project involves the use of Internet of Things (IoT) integration, Raspberry Pi, and computing at devices used for edge into drip irrigation systems. This convergence may enhance the water usage efficiently and authorizes farmers with real-time data and control over their irrigation processes. Drip irrigation, renowned for its water-conserving attributes, entails delivering water precisely to plant roots via a network of tubes and emitters.

project_title: Micro-controller Based Position detection
description: A low cost STM 32 arm processor is used to read the information from rotary encoder in order to detect the position of moving rotor in robotic system. Example : humanoid Moving arm position detection.

project_title: Assistive device
description: To develop a wearable device for visually impaired person to assist in day to day activities

project_title: Open-source cybersecurity tools for social engineering
description: Learning and practicing AI powered cybersecurity tools for social engineering applications.

project_title: Absorption of CO2 bubble in solution: A numerical solution of ordinary differential equation by MATLAB
description: This project aims to develop a computational model using MATLAB to simulate the absorption process of a CO2 bubble in a solution, providing insights into mass transfer phenomena and chemical absorption.

project_title: Hand Cricket Game using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Speech to Text APIs
description: Develop an interactive online hand cricket game through a web application, allowing users to play using voice commands for enhanced accessibility. Features include dynamic user score calculation, accompanied by immersive sound effects and captivating animation effects, elevating the gaming experience.

project_title: Voice-Activated Quiz Game
description: Design a quiz game where players answer questions by speaking their responses. Students can use speech recognition to interpret the player's answers and determine if they are correct or incorrect.

project_title: Design and Development of AI based Foot Splint using Fusion 360
description: Exploring AI integration in foot splint design through Fusion 360, innovating personalized solutions for biomechanical support and rehabilitation. The student should have creative thinking to apply the appropriate tool.

project_title: IPL Cricket Score Prediction using Machine Learningarning
description: Since the dawn of the IPL in 2008, it has attracted viewers all around the globe. A high level of uncertainty and last-minute nail-biters have urged fans to watch the matches. Within a short period, the IPL has become the highest revenue-generating league in cricket. In a cricket match, we often see the scoreline showing the probability of the team winning based on the current match situation. This prediction is usually done with the help of data analytics
sdg: SDG 8 - Decent Work and Economic Growth

project_title: Extractng Text from Image
description: Given an image, extract text from the Image using Python

project_title: Voice conversion
description: Voice conversion converts voice of one speaker into the voice of another speaker without changing the linguistic content. The voice conversion techniques can be used in applications namely,  foreign language education, dubbing, and speech translation.

project_title: Beneficial Use Tannery Leather Waste as Poultry Feed
description: We attempt to remove Chromium from leather waste and recover useful proteins that can be used as feed for livestock.

project_title: Mobile App for Food Delivery
description:
Develop a mobile APP to keep track of catering services provided by homemakers and connect to the customers.
Provide options – Register food caterers and menu, availability check, order, tracking, billing

project_title: Water Quality Monitoring System: Ensuring Clean Water Access
description: This project involves creating an IoT-based water quality monitoring system. Students can design and implement sensors to measure parameters like pH, turbidity, and dissolved oxygen in water sources. The system can alert users or authorities about water quality issues, helping ensure access to clean and safe drinking water, which aligns with Sustainable Development Goal 6 focused on clean water and sanitation.

project_title: Flower Waste Recycling
description: Flower Waste into useful products
sdg: SDG 8 - Decent Work and Economic Growth

project_title: Web Enabled Plant disease detection device for smart agriculture
description: The students will develop an Web based solution for plant disease detection using python for smart agriculture applications. The students can also get an exposure on hardware for implementation.

project_title: Speed Control of DC Motor using Microcontroller
description: Speed Control of DC Motor using Microcontroller by generating pulses for single phase inverter

project_title: Green synthesis of nanoparticles using plant extracts
description: Green synthesis aims in particular at decreasing the usage of toxic chemicals. For instance, the use of biological materials such as plants is usually safe. Using the principles of green chemistry, plant-mediated synthesis of nanoparticles will be done.

project_title: Virtual reality in Rehabilitation
description: Creating a Virtual Reality environment for rehabilitation

project_title: EMG analysis for hand rehabilitation
description: Analysis of EMG to study to the hand muscles and design protocol for hand rehabilitation

project_title: Green Technology: Build an Electronic Soil Moisture Sensor to Conserve Water
description: The Green Technology project aims to construct an electronic soil moisture sensor to aid in water conservation efforts. This sensor will provide real-time data on soil moisture levels, allowing for precise irrigation scheduling and reducing water waste in agricultural and landscaping applications. By enabling more efficient water usage, this project contributes to environmental sustainability and resource conservation

project_title: Agrowaste Recycling
description: Transforming Agrowaste into value added products

project_title: Build your own power bank for IoT Systems
description: This Project aims to build a cost-effective power bank for powering up the IoT Projects as DIY (Do It Yourself).

project_title: Decision-making framework to evaluate Unmanned Aerial Vehicles for Precision Agriculture
description: The project aims to provide a dedicated decision-making framework to evaluate Unmanned Aerial Vehicles for Precision Agriculture.

project_title: Application of biochar-based photocatalysts for the degradation of environmental contaminants
description: The application of biochar-based photocatalysts presents a promising approach for the degradation of environmental contaminants. Biochar, a carbonaceous material derived from the pyrolysis of biomass, serves as an excellent support material for photocatalysts due to its high surface area, porosity, and stability. By incorporating photocatalytic nanoparticles such as titanium dioxide (TiO2) or zinc oxide (ZnO) onto biochar surfaces, a synergistic effect is achieved, enhancing the photocatalytic activity for the degradation of various contaminants including organic pollutants, heavy metals, and emerging contaminants like pharmaceuticals and personal care products.

project_title: Design of a Sustainable City
description: A urban design of a city will be planned that will practice and promote the United Nations' blueprint of the 17 Sustainable development goals.

project_title: Health Management System with Diet Plan
description: Health Management System with Diet Plan - We need to add our diet and exercises that we need to do, or we can save our daily diet or exercise with date and time to keep records. It also helps us to make another fitness plan.

project_title: Automatic Water Level Controller
description: This project aims to create an automatic water level controller using Arduino that maintains the water level in a tank or container by controlling the flow of water. It introduces students to basic electronics, coding, and the concept of automation.
sdg: SDG 8 - Decent Work and Economic Growth

project_title: Arduino Powered Fish Feeder
description: The feeder mechanism attached to the shafts of the stepper motor, and when an obstacle is detected by an ultrasonic sensor the stepper motor gets activated as a result of which the feeder moves and drops grains of food inside the aquarium.

project_title: Design of PWM using Embedded C
description: Gating Pulse generation using embedded C for single phase Inverter

project_title: Design and development of diffuse reflectance based cooking oil adulteration detection
description: Some of the edible oils are being mixed and adulterated with low quality and low-cost vegetable oil to achieve more profit. Adulteration of edible oil leads to various health hazards. Where mustard oil is being adulterated with argemone oil it has shown the effect of gallbladder cancer. There is an immediate need to maintain the authenticity of oils and fats and also to improve various detection methods. This project focuses on spectroscopic techniques to find adulteration.

project_title: Climate Change impacts on water resources
description: Due to urbanization there is micro climate change which has impact in form of floods & Drought. To overcome this issue awareness on climate change awareness has to be introduced at all stages. These awareness can be created through modeling & managerial measures.

project_title: Generative AI for Eye Disease classification
description: This work involves using different deep learning models for classifying the different types of eye disease. It is followed by applying generative AI for identifying the reason for selecting a particular disease.

project_title: FarmersFriend App
description: This mobile app gives information about help centers, crops to be cultivated, fertilizers and other aspects related to farming .

project_title: Working Model of Wind Energy Conversion System
description: In this project the students will build a wind turbine along with the generator and demonstrate the working of the wind energy conversion system.

project_title: Treatment of dye wastewater using biomass
description: Color removal from wastewater has been a matter of concern, both in the aesthetic sense and health point of view. The effectiveness of adsorption for dye removal from wastewater has made it an ideal alternative to other expensive treatment methods. In this project, low-cost biomass is used as adsorbents, potentially useful for wastewater treatment, are reviewed.

project_title: Music Player using Python
description: Design a music player using Python

project_title: Investigates the machinability characteristics of hard-to-cut materials.
description: The machining of hard-to-cut materials in a dry environment has generated high heat and friction due to the nature of properties like high yield strength, high hot hardness, low thermal conductivity, and work-hardening tendency, which deteriorate the machinability characteristics. This project proposes cryo-processing of cutting inserts to enhance their ability to handle dry machining of difficult-to-machine materials.

project_title: Wireless power transfer using electro-magnetic coupling for electrical appliances.
description: Inductive Power Transfer (IPT) is a technology that enables the wireless transmission of electrical power over short distances without the need for physical contact or traditional conductive wiring. It operates on the principle of electromagnetic induction, where power is transferred between two coils: a transmitter coil and a receiver coil. IPT relies on the creation of a magnetic field by an alternating current (AC) passing through a transmitter coil. This magnetic field induces a voltage in the nearby receiver coil, which can then be used to power electrical devices or charge batteries.

project_title: Design and development of life saving kit for mines workers
description: This project aims to develop a safety kit which will help the locked in people to survive inside the trapped environment.

project_title: Synthesis of multifunctional catalyst for the treatment of industial wastewater
description: Industrial waste mismanagement exerts a deleterious impact on the ecosystem due to discharging of hazardous organic pollutants into water bodies, thereby engendering a cascade of ecological ramifications and precipitating enduring health hazards.The unique characteristics render the catalyst highly suitable for large-scale applications, particularly in the continuous remediation of a diverse array of pollutants, due to its enhanced magnetic separability and sustained catalytic performance.

project_title: Simulation of transparent clay
description: Instead using the real clay, the method of stbilisation can be studied through using transparent clay.
sdg: SDG 8 - Decent Work and Economic Growth

project_title: Experimental studies in radiation heat transfer equipment
description: Project objective is to conduct experiments in Boltzmann and emissivity apparatus and to determine Stefan-Boltzmann Constant and emissivity of a test surface.

project_title: Analysis of solvent properties for CO2 capture process
description: Experimental analysis of properties of the solvent which can be used for CO2 absorption process.

project_title: Acoustic Analysis of normal and Lombard speech Tamil corpus
description: This work will enable the students to understand the characteristics of speech signal acoustics and how the speech in quiet environment differs from that of Lombard speech(Speech in noisy environment)

project_title: Land Use Land Cover Changes and its Impacts on flood
description: Land Use Land Cover Changes is altering the existing natural land pattern, which have impacts on natural environment. The impact is seen in form of urban flooding or urban heat island. After 2015, 2021 and 2023 floods in Chennai it is necessary to study land use land cover changes.

project_title: Comparative study of performance of cutting tools in turning process
description: Turning is one of the popular machining process used in a manufacturing industry to convert the cylindrical raw material into useful finished products. However we need to select the appropriate cutting tools for the process. In this study, we shall assess the performance of two cutting tools for turning steel.

project_title: Developing a animation Story  using Blender
description: Develop a story telling video for 3 to 5 minutes using Blender tool to educate the children.

project_title: Sensor enabled assistive system
description: The system aims at monitoring the vital parameters of special people and to develop an alert mechanism.

project_title: Smart Materials for Robotic Actuators
description: Role of smart materials such as shape memory alloys in the development of actuators for robotic applications

project_title: Generating QR code with Python
description: From restaurant e-menus to airline boarding passes, QR codes have numerous applications that impact your day-to-day life and enrich the user's experience.  In its most basic format, a QR code contains black squares and dots on a white background, with information that any smartphone or device with a dedicated QR scanner can decode. Unlike a traditional bar code, which holds information  horizontally, a QR code holds the data in two dimensions, and it can hold over a hundred times more information.
sdg: SDG 8 - Decent Work and Economic Growth

project_title: Audio Steganography
description: Hiding the text/audio message in audio

project_title: ROAS Prediction and Suggestion System
description: To build a Machine learning based system that predicts the Return on Ad Spent percentage based on the amount spent in each advertisement and also provide suggestions on investments in Advertising forums.

project_title: Design of a mobile charger
description: The students will learn the basic principle behind the design of a mobile charger and will have exposures in PCB design.

project_title: Performance studies in HVAC and Refrigeration Systems
description: Project objective is to conduct experiments in Heating, Ventilating, Air conditioning and Refrigeration test rigs and to assess cooling performance of these systems.

project_title: Object detection on road scenes
description: Accurate object detection on road scenes can contribute to improving road safety by identifying potential hazards such as pedestrians, cyclists, or obstacles, thereby reducing the risk of accidents and injuries.

project_title: Performance appraisal system for hydrogen energy storage systems
description: The project aims to evaluate hydrogen storage methods considering economic, technological, environmental, and social factors using a performance appraisal mechanism

project_title: Crowd Counting using image processing techniques
description: Crowd counting is a task of counting targeted objects in an image. The objective of this project is to use image processing techniques and automate the process of crowd counting and later apply this work to any real-time applications like surveillance, traffic detection, disaster management.

project_title: Virtual reality (VR) for phobia
description: Virtual Reality (VR) for phobia offers a safe, controlled environment for exposure therapy, allowing individuals to confront and gradually desensitize to their fears. This innovative approach combines immersive simulations with therapeutic techniques, enhancing the effectiveness of phobia treatment.

project_title: Road crossing system for visually impaired in india
description: Existing systems like canes can guide blind people by helping them detect the obstacles in their path through touching/poking. Alternative to the above method some other aids include smart belts, smart rings, smart canes etc, which can assist them by detecting obstacles using ultra sonic sensors. This project on Intelligent Turtle Car Learning Suite is proposed to study microcontroller application development system to assist visually impaired people.

project_title: Design of PWM using embedded C for Single phase Inverter
description: Design of pulse width modulation using embedded C for single phase inverter

project_title: Explainable AI for detecting offensive words from social media
description: Identifying offensive language in social media involves employing various techniques from natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML). Explainable AI (XAI) provides transparency or interpretability to the ML models and helps to identify the dominant words contributing to offensive language. Through this program, students will be learning how to use NLP and ML to detect offensive language from social media and also they will be learning how to employ XAI to interpret the model of offensive language detection from social media text.

project_title: Sono-assisted CO2 Stripping using 360kHz: Process Intensification by Al2O3 Nanoparticles
description: The study investigates intensify the sono-assisted (360kHz) CO2-rich 30 wt% monoethanolamine (MEA) regeneration using Al2O3 nanoparticles (20 – 30nm) for sustainable energy and environment.

project_title: IoT based battery monitoring system
description: The proposed system will monitor the battery parameters like voltage, current and temperature, and accumulate the data in cloud. The analysis of the parameters could be extended to estimate the battery health and remaining useful-lifetime.

project_title: Laser based advanced double layer security system
description: It is an IoT based anti-theft advanced security system with local and remote alert notification.

project_title: Impact of Chennai Metro on Land Use -Land Cover
description: The metro transit system not only improves mobility and connectivity in a city but has secondary developmental impact in terms of land use changes. This project aims to quantify the land use changes using geo-informatics by analysing satellite images.

project_title: Automatic Electricity Bill Meter Reading and Billing System for smart farming
description: The aim of this project is to automate the processes of electricity meter reading and billing, aiming to elevate efficiency and sustainability within the realm of smart farming. By harnessing State-of-the-art technologies, including the Internet of Things (IoT) and machine learning, this system finely tunes the accuracy, accessibility, and management of electricity consumption data on farms. The strategic deployment of smart meters, equipped with IoT-enabled sensors, facilitates real-time data collection of electricity consumption in smart farming environments.
